company_info.description:
In 1965, Fridays opened its first location in New York City. Today, there are 890 restaurants in 60 countries offering high quality, authentic American food and legendary drinks, served with genuine personal service. Bringing people together to socialize and celebrate the freeing and liberating spirit of "Friday"​ is the concept's founding premise, from which the brand promise "​In Here, It's Always Friday®"​ was born. 

For more information, visit www.Fridays.com or follow us on Twitter at @TGIFridays
